Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Diamond, PolyLine, Rectangle, Triangle

    public abstract class Polygon
extends Shape
    This class maintains information for drawing a Polygon and extends Shape.
    Version:
    April 11, 2019 Lab 10
    Author:
    Monique Shotande, _________________

      • Fields inherited from class Shape

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor for a Polygon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
      This method defines how to draw a polygon, by constructing a convex shape with the location of the points as vertices, and fills in the space with the color if filed is true.

        getColor, getLocation, isFilled

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polygon

        public Polygon(java.awt.Color color,
               boolean filled)
        Constructor for a Polygon
        Parameters:
        color - Desired color of the oval
        filled - Whether or not the oval should be filled

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
        This method defines how to draw a polygon, by constructing a convex shape with the location of the points as vertices, and fills in the space with the color if filed is true. See Java api for Graphics on how to draw polygons
        Parameters:
        graphics - A Graphics object for drawing the shapes
